title: Eaton Vance's Piantedosi: Opportunity in Pinnacle Foods (Audio)
itunes:title: Eaton Vance's Piantedosi: Opportunity in Pinnacle Foods (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Lew Piantedosi, Vice President and Director of Growth Equity for Eaton Vance, for a look at the equity markets and sectors he is investing in.
